  • EZcollateral Web Solutions
    Are you tired of chasing schools, medical offices, and other agencies for collateral contacts? Now you don’t have to with the EZCollateral Web Application. We offer customized electronic forms, leaving you to focus on what’s most important—your clients.
    Learn More

What is EzCollateral

EzCollateral is designed to help Social Workers and Case Managers send and receive “Sources of Verification” and/or “Collateral Contacts” electronically. Through a centralized dashboard, accessible from any device with an internet connection, Social Workers and Case Managers can remotely manage vital information. .

Specialties

Simplified Collateral Contracts

Are you tired of chasing schools, medical offices, and other agencies for collateral contacts? Now you don’t have to with EZCollateral. We make it easy to get the information you need to manage caseloads and support your clients. Our platform includes Medical, School, and Employment references. We also offer customized forms for your special requests, leaving you to focus on what’s most important—your clients!

Comprehensive Support For Social Workers and Case Managers

Social workers and Case Managers are on the front lines for the agencies they work for. Often times, they’re limited on resources. At EZCollateral, we’ve developed a solution that provides comprehensive support for social workers and the people they assist—streamlining information in an easy-to-use platform.

No More Wasting Time

Gone are the days of endless commutes and trips to the fax machine. EZCollateral reduces the time you spend making phone calls and sending information back and forth. All you have to do is send and receive the time-sensitive, confidential information you need to do your job right from your laptop, mobile device, and or tablet.

Safe and Secure

In your line of work, privacy and confidentiality are non-negotiable. We’ve built our platform with that in mind. Confidently send and receive the collateral forms you need to close or update your files.

Automatic Reminders

Case Managers and Social Workers are almost always pinched for time. To us, it just doesn’t make sense to waste precious time sending emails or making phone calls simply to remind people to fill out forms. EzCollateral sends out automatic reminders to folks who haven’t provided the necessary information so they don’t have to. Never again waste time sending reminders to individuals in your caseload by using our platform.

Multiple User Levels For Greater Functionality

Supervisors can also use EzCollateral to monitor when collaterals are sent and how long it takes to receive them. This reduces time spent following up with social workers who need to be with their clients instead of worrying about paperwork. Supervisors appreciate it because it saves them time waiting on monthly reports.

21st-Century Solutions for Case Managers

Sending documents electronically is the way of the future. Paper documents not only take precious time to send and receive, they’re also easily lost. Electronic documents provide an easier way to track and communicate with the other party, thus lightening the load for everyone.

Real Time Statistics

EzCollateral also provides monthly statistics on how long it takes to receive completed collaterals for monthly reports. No more guesswork. No more wasting hours each month. Just the information caseworkers need to complete their job.

Contact us today!

Prepare

We build your forms. Then they’re automatically embedded for your choosing in our easy-to-use dashboard.

Send

With one click you can send a secure link to Recipients.

Automatic Reminders

Reminders are automatically sent until completion.

Recieve

You get your forms back is record time. Headaches gone.

Creative & Responsive Design

Our goal is to empower Case Managers and Social Workers with tools to send documents from their smart devices. The EzCollateral Web Application can be accessed through your desktop, tablet, and/or smartphone.
